name: Housing Workshops
description: Housing Workshops for clients in San Francisco AND outside of the San Francisco area. For San Francisco clients: Certificate of Homebuyer Education for San Francisco Mayor’s Office of Housing and Community Development’s Programs In order to qualify for the San Francisco Mayor's Office of Housing and Community Development's programs, you must obtain a Certificate of Homebuyer Education. You will earn the certificate by following these steps to complete the required ten hours of homebuyer educatio
